# Results


```{r hide}

library(data.table)
library(dplyr)
library(lubridate)
library(ggplot2)

rate = read.csv("../ml-25m/ratings.csv")
rate$date = as.POSIXct(rate$timestamp, origin="1970-01-01", tz="GMT")
rate$date = as.Date(rate$date, "GMT")

rate$year = format(rate$date, format = "%Y")
rate = rate %>% filter(year > 1995)
rate_count = rate %>% group_by(year) %>% summarise(count = n())

g = ggplot(rate_count, aes(x = year, y = count, group = 1)) + geom_line() +
  ggtitle("Rating Trend") +
  labs (x = "Year", y = "Number") +
  theme_grey(16) +
  theme(legend.title = element_blank())
g

```
